comment.author: 26033330@N00
comment._content: I haven't seen this photo before. Extremely interesting.

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: Great photo of General Mulcahy, a very interesting man. This is another photo of him.

comment.author: 23160039@N08
comment._content: His son, also called Risteard, wrote an excellent biography of his Dad and his life and times called "My Father The General".

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: Another very good book about him is "Portrait of a Revolutionary: General Richard Mulcahy and the Founding of the Irish Free State" by Maryann Gialanella Valiulis.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: And would you look at that! We have both My Father... and Portrait of a Revolutionary... Should I be touting for business and trying to get ye all to come in and get a reader's ticket, though I think you're a bit far far away, Paul? Not sure about [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23160039@N08].
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/] Just a little too far away unfortunately Carol, but you never know I might pop in for a visit one of these days.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33577523@N08] Very welcome any time! I have a special red carpet all prepared for any passing Flickroonies.  :)
